name: Console RPG
description:
Console RPG

Created only with C++, while I was learning I tried to incorporate all the things I have learned while still pushing myself to use things I have never learned for continual self growth.

This is a windows Build release only.

Please download and let me know what you think, It started very small and I have expanded it a bit. 

I would Love to hear your comments on such a simple game  on paper that was a pretty big 2 month project in the end.
